events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's complaint about receiving the wrong product.
Assigning the refund case to agent Sarah Thompson to handle the customer's request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached the photo of the wrong item for your review. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and you can return the incorrect item using the prepaid shipping label we will send shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to resolving this quickly.
Your refund request is processed, and the prepaid return label was sent to your email. Please ship the wrong item back at your earliest convenience.
We wanted to check in if you received the prepaid label and if everything went smoothly with your refund process.
The case has been closed following successful refund processing and return shipment confirmation from the customer.
